title: Textile, 1770–90
dimensions:
Warp: 84cm (33 1/2in.) Weft: 78.5cm (30 3/4in.)
Both selvedges present.
Height of full repeat: 50 cm (19 3/4in.)
Width of full repeat: 38.5cm (15 1/4in.)
description: Scattered exotic blossoms on a cracked ice background. Two reds, blue, yellow, (overprinted for green) mulberry and black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1770–90.
1770–90. Block-printed on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-212.
